name: Starmie

attacks.name: Recover
attacks.text: Discard 1 Water Energy card attached to Starmie in order to use this attack. Remove all damage counters from Starmie.

attacks.name: Star Freeze
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pok√©mon is now Paralyzed.

flavorText: Its central core glows with the seven colors of the rainbow. Some people value this core as a gem.

strengths: Recover allows complete healing, providing exceptional sustainability
Star Freeze offers paralysis disruption with decent 20 damage
Low retreat cost of 1 provides excellent mobility
60 HP is solid for a common Stage 1 Pokemon
Strong against Fire-type Pokemon in the format
weaknesses: Recover requires discarding a Water Energy, limiting long-term viability
Star Freeze's 3 Energy cost is expensive for only 20 damage
Lightning weakness is significant against popular Electric Pokemon
No resistance to help with defensive matchups
Paralysis effect relies on coin flip, making it unreliable
synergies: Rain Dance Blastoise allows easy Energy reattachment after using Recover
Energy Retrieval can return discarded Water Energy to hand for reuse
Super Energy Removal combined with Star Freeze paralysis creates lock strategies
Defender can reduce incoming damage between Recover uses
counters: Electabuzz - Lightning weakness and high damage overcome healing
Zapdos - Can deal massive damage that healing cannot keep up with
Energy removal decks - Cannot Recover without Water Energy
